code: import React from'react';import{Code,Database,Server,Smartphone,Palette}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Skills=()=>{const skills=[{name:'React',icon:Code,color:'bg-blue-500'},{name:'Tailwind CSS',icon:Palette,color:'bg-cyan-500'},{name:'JavaScript',icon:Code,color:'bg-yellow-500'},{name:'HTML/CSS',icon:Palette,color:'bg-orange-500'},{name:'Spring Boot',icon:Server,color:'bg-green-500'},{name:'MySQL',icon:Database,color:'bg-blue-600'},{name:'Docker',icon:Server,color:'bg-blue-400'},{name:'JWT',icon:Smartphone,color:'bg-purple-500'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"py-20 px-4 max-w-6xl mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-4xl font-bold text-center mb-12 text-slate-100",children:"Skills & Technologies"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6",children:skills.map((skill,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-slate-800 border border-slate-600 rounded-lg p-6 text-center hover:scale-105 transition-transform duration-300 hover:border-blue-500 group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-16 h-16 ".concat(skill.color," rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4 group-hover:scale-110 transition-transform duration-300"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(skill.icon,{size:32,className:"text-white"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold text-slate-200",children:skill.name})]},index))})]});};export default Skills;
